Submodules¶

matchzoo.preprocessors module¶

Matchzoo toolkit for text pre-processing.

class matchzoo.preprocessors.DigitRemovalUnit[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit to remove digits.

transform(tokens: list) → list[source]¶

Remove digits from list of tokens.

Parameters:tokens – list of tokens to be filtered.
Return tokens:tokens of tokens without digits.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.LemmatizationUnit[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit for token lemmatization.

transform(tokens: list) → list[source]¶

Lemmatization a sequence of tokens.

Parameters:tokens – list of tokens to be lemmatized.
Return tokens:list of lemmatizd tokens.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.LowercaseUnit[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit for text lower case.

transform(tokens: list) → list[source]¶

Convert list of tokens to lower case.

Parameters:tokens – list of tokens.
Return tokens:lower-cased list of tokens.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit[source]¶

Bases: object

Process unit do not persive state (i.e. do not need fit).

transform(input: Any)[source]¶

Abstract base method, need to be implemented in subclass.

class matchzoo.preprocessors.PuncRemovalUnit[source]¶

Remove punctuations from list of tokens.

Parameters:tokens – list of toekns.
Return rv:tokens without punctuation.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.StatefulProcessorUnit[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit do persive state (i.e. need fit).

fit(input: Any) → dict[source]¶

Abstract base method, need to be implemented in subclass.

state¶

Get current state.

class matchzoo.preprocessors.StemmingUnit(stemmer='porter')[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit for token stemming.

transform(tokens: list) → list[source]¶

Reducing inflected words to their word stem, base or root form.

Parameters:
  • tokens – list of string to be stemmed.
  • stemmer – stemmer to use, porter or lancaster.
Raises:

ValueError – stemmer type should be porter or lancaster.
Return tokens:

stemmed token.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.StopRemovalUnit(lang='en')[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit to remove stop words.

get_stopwords() → list[source]¶

Get stopwords based on language.

Params lang:language code.
Return stop_list:
 list of stop words.
transform(tokens: list) → list[source]¶

Remove stopwords from list of tokenized tokens.

Parameters:
  • tokens – list of tokenized tokens.
  • lang – language code for stopwords.
Return tokens:

list of tokenized tokens without stopwords.
class matchzoo.preprocessors.TokenizeUnit[source]¶

Bases: matchzoo.preprocessors.ProcessorUnit

Process unit for text tokenization.

transform(input: str) → list[source]¶

Process input data from raw terms to list of tokens.

Parameters:input – raw textual input.
Return tokens:tokenized tokens as a list.
